biz.neustar.hopper.record
Class KEYRecord

java.lang.Object
  biz.neustar.hopper.record.Record
      biz.neustar.hopper.record.impl.KEYBase
          biz.neustar.hopper.record.KEYRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Record>
public class KEYRecord
extends KEYBase

Key - contains a cryptographic public key. The data can be converted to objects implementing java.security.interfaces.PublicKey

Author:
Brian Wellington
See Also:
DNSSEC, Serialized Form

KEYRecord

public KEYRecord(Name name,
                 DClass in,

                 int flags,
                 int proto,
                 int alg,

Creates a KEY Record from the given data

Parameters:
flags - Flags describing the key's properties
proto - The protocol that the key was created for
alg - The key's algorithm
key - Binary data representing the key

KEYRecord

public KEYRecord(Name name,
                 DClass dclass,
                 long ttl,
                 int flags,
                 int proto,
                 int alg,
                 java.security.PublicKey key)
          throws DNSSEC.DNSSECException
Creates a KEY Record from the given data

Parameters:
flags - Flags describing the key's properties
proto - The protocol that the key was created for
alg - The key's algorithm
key - The key as a PublicKey
Throws:
DNSSEC.DNSSECException - The PublicKey could not be converted into DNS format.
